# isEmpty

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the path has any valid elements.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEmpty: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Valid path elements include commands to move to a specified point, draw a line or curve segment, or close the path. Thus, a path is not considered empty even if all you do is call the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBezierPath/move(to:)] method.

## Performing hit-testing

- **contains(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified point is within the region that the path encloses.
- **bounds**: The bounding rectangle of the path.
